info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:27AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Putnam and Bureau Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 320 AM CDT, thunderstorms producing locally heavy rain and wind gusts up to 35 mph were occurring along a line extending from near Walnut to near Toulon. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Lightning, brief heavy rain, and winds around 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects like tents. Locations impacted include... La Moille and Ladd. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 46 and 72. Interstate 180 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Locally heavy rainfall occurring with these storms and may lead to ponding on roadways and in low-lying areas. Persons in campgrounds, including at the Bureau County Fairgrounds, should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
